EntryName	HMOX2_HUMAN
ProteinName	Heme oxygenase 2 (HO-2) (EC 1.14.14.18) [Cleaved into: Heme oxygenase 2 soluble form]
GeneName	HMOX2 HO2
Length	287
Function	Catalyzes the oxidative cleavage of heme at the alpha-methene bridge carbon, released as carbon monoxide (CO), to generate biliverdin IXalpha, while releasing the central heme iron chelate as ferrous iron.
Subcellular Location	Microsome membrane; Endoplasmic reticulum membrane
